# The Procedures

+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| Steps                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Screenshot                                           |
+::+:====================================================:+
| 1.  Load the popdata.csv file into Tableau Desktop.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | ![](images/load-data.png)                            |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 2.  In order to create the age-sex pyramid, we need the age group,which is the discrete value, instead of continuous value.So, from the 'data source' panel, right click on the 'PA' and click on 'create group'. The criteria to make groups is referred to website [PopulationPyramid.Net](https://www.populationpyramid.net/) | ![Figure 1- Group the 'Age' parameter](images/1.png) |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 3.  From 'Data' panel, click on the little downside triangle, and click on 'create parameter'.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | ![](images/%E6%96%B0%E5%8F%98%E9%87%8F.png)          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 4.  Create a new parameter called 'female', which is the total population of female.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | ![](images/female.png)                               |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 5.  Create a new parameter called 'male',which is the total population of male.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | ![](images/male.png)                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 6.  Drag 'female'and 'male' to Columns, 'PA' and 'Age (group)' to Rows, drag 'Sex'to colour.Then right click on the title 'PA' and click on 'sort', choose sort by 'Field', in descending order and field name is 'pop' which is the total population.                                                                           | ![](images/3-01.png)                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 7.  Then, right click on 'PA', click 'Filter'. Choose the top 9 area with the highest population.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | ![](images/3.1-01.png)                               |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 8.  Right click on 'Age (group)', then click 'Filter'. Check 'Null' and check 'Exclude'.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | ![](images/exclude%20null.png)                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 9.  Click on 'Data' at the top of the window, then choose 'Extract Data'.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | ![](images/extractdata.png)                          |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 10. Click on 'Extract'                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | ![](images/exdata.png)                               |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 11. Click on 'Server' at the top, choose 'Tableau Public',then 'Save to Tableau Public'.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | ![](images/4.png)                                    |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 12. If not satisfied, click on 'Color' under Marks card, click 'Edit Colors', then pick more pretty ones.                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | ![](images/5.1.png)                                  |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
| 13. Click on white space of the 'PA' column, click on 'Format', and give a shading to this column.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | ![](images/5.2.png)                                  |
| 14. Public again.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                      |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+
